comments:
- Create a simple project with the name "Simple Project" (make sure that it
contains the space between the two words)
- Profile an arbitrary Java application.  Use the destination tab to set the
profiling project location to the simple project created
- Once the Java application completes, attempt to save the monitor


Notice the errors that are displayed regarding a bad resource name. 
Furthermore, when attempting to delete the monitor, all the decedents of the
monitor get deleted but the monitor itself doesn't get deleted.
Can you append the exceptions please

Is this a regression? If so it may still be a candidate for 4.1
Yes. Just confirm that problem does not exist in TPTP 4.0 driver.

project/folder name in URI of resource is encoded when save, resulting name
mismatch with the actual project/folder name created on workspace.

Marius,

converter.
